33 #define __PV_REFERENCE__ typename PiercedVector<value_t, id_t>::reference
34 #define __PV_CONST_REFERENCE__ typename PiercedVector<value_t, id_t>::const_reference
35 #define __PV_POINTER__ typename PiercedVector<value_t, id_t>::pointer
36 #define __PV_CONST_POINTER__ typename PiercedVector<value_t, id_t>::const_pointer

38 namespace bitpit {
39 
40 class BasePiercedVector {
41 
42 public:
43  virtual ~BasePiercedVector() = default;
44 
45 protected:
46  BasePiercedVector();
47 
48 };

62 template<typename value_t, typename id_t = long>
63 class PiercedVector : public BasePiercedVector,
64  public PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>,
65  public PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t> {
66 
67 public:
68  // Typedefs
69 
73  typedef PiercedVectorKernel<id_t> kernel_type;
74 
78  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::id_type id_type;
79 
83  typedef typename PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::value_type value_type;
84 
88  typedef typename PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::iterator iterator;
89 
93  typedef typename PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::const_iterator const_iterator;
94 
98  typedef typename PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::raw_iterator raw_iterator;
99 
103  typedef typename PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::raw_const_iterator raw_const_iterator;
104 
108  typedef typename PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::range range;
109 
113  typedef typename PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::const_range const_range;
114 
115  // Contructors
116  PiercedVector();
117  PiercedVector(std::size_t n);
118  PiercedVector(const PiercedVector<value_t, id_t> &x);
119  PiercedVector(PiercedVector<value_t, id_t> &&x) = default;
120  PiercedVector<value_t, id_t> & operator=(PiercedVector<value_t, id_t> x);
121 
122  // Methods that modify the contents of the container
123  iterator reclaim(id_t id);
124  iterator reclaimAfter(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id);
125  iterator reclaimBack(id_t id);
126  iterator reclaimBefore(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id);
127 
128  iterator moveAfter(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id, bool delayed = false);
129  iterator moveBefore(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id, bool delayed = false);
130 
131  iterator insert(id_t id, const value_t &value);
132  iterator insertAfter(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id, const value_t &value);
133  iterator insertBefore(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id, const value_t &value);
134 
135  iterator replace(id_t id, value_t &&value);
136 
137  iterator pushBack(id_t id, const value_t &value);
138 
139  template<typename... Args, typename std::enable_if<PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::template has_initialize<Args...>()>::type * = nullptr>
140  iterator emreclaim(id_t id, Args&&... args);
141  template<typename... Args, typename std::enable_if<PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::template has_initialize<Args...>()>::type * = nullptr>
142  iterator emreclaimAfter(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id, Args&&... args);
143  template<typename... Args, typename std::enable_if<PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::template has_initialize<Args...>()>::type * = nullptr>
144  void emreclaimBack(id_t id, Args&&... args);
145  template<typename... Args, typename std::enable_if<PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::template has_initialize<Args...>()>::type * = nullptr>
146  iterator emreclaimBefore(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id, Args&&... args);
147 
148  template<typename... Args>
149  iterator emplace(id_t id, Args&&... args);
150  template<typename... Args>
151  iterator emplaceAfter(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id, Args&&... args);
152  template<typename... Args>
153  void emplaceBack(id_t id, Args&&... args);
154  template<typename... Args>
155  iterator emplaceBefore(const id_t &referenceId, id_t id, Args&&... args);
156 
157  template<typename... Args>
158  iterator emreplace(id_t id, Args&&... args);
159 
160  iterator erase(id_t id, bool delayed = false);
161  void popBack();
162 
163  void swap(id_t id_first, id_t id_second);
164 
165  // Methods that modify the container as a whole
166  void clear(bool release = true);
167  void reserve(std::size_t n);
168  void resize(std::size_t n);
169  void sort();
170  void sortAfter(id_t referenceId, bool inclusive);
171  void sortBefore(id_t referenceId, bool inclusive);
172  void squeeze();
173  void shrinkToFit();
174  void swap(PiercedVector &x) noexcept;
175 
176  // Methods that extract information about the container
177  const PiercedVectorKernel<id_t> & getKernel() const;
178  const PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t> & getStorage() const;
179 
180  void dump() const;
181 
182  // Methods that extract the contents of the container
183  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::back;
184  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::front;
185 
186  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::at;
187  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawAt;
188 
189  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::operator[];
190 
191  // Iterators
192  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::begin;
193  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::end;
194  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::cbegin;
195  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::cend;
196 
197  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawBegin;
198  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawEnd;
199  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawCbegin;
200  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawCend;
201 
202  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::find;
203  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawFind;
204 
205  // Dump and restore
206  template<typename T = value_t, typename std::enable_if<PiercedVectorStorage<T, id_t>::has_restore()>::type * = nullptr>
207  void restore(std::istream &stream);
208 
209  template<typename T = value_t, typename std::enable_if<PiercedVectorStorage<T, id_t>::has_dump()>::type * = nullptr>
210  void dump(std::ostream &stream) const;
211 
212  void restoreKernel(std::istream &stream);
213 
214  void dumpKernel(std::ostream &stream) const;
215 
216 protected:
217  using PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::clear;
218  using PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::reserve;
219  using PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::resize;
220  using PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::sort;
221  using PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::sortAfter;
222  using PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::sortBefore;
223  using PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::squeeze;
224  using PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::shrinkToFit;
225  using PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::swap;
226 
227  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::setStaticKernel;
228  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::setDynamicKernel;
229  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::unsetKernel;
230  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::getKernel;
231  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::getKernelType;
232  using PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::getSyncMode;
233 
234 private:
235  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::FillAction FillAction;
236  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::MoveAction MoveAction;
237  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::SwapAction SwapAction;
238  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::EraseAction EraseAction;
239  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::ClearAction ClearAction;
240  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::ReserveAction ReserveAction;
241  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::ResizeAction ResizeAction;
242  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::SortAction SortAction;
243  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::SqueezeAction SqueezeAction;
244  typedef typename PiercedVectorKernel<id_t>::ShrinkToFitAction ShrinkToFitAction;
245 
246  iterator reclaimValue(const FillAction &action);
247  iterator insertValue(const FillAction &action, const value_t &value);
248  template<typename... Args, typename std::enable_if<PiercedVectorStorage<value_t, id_t>::template has_initialize<Args...>()>::type * = nullptr>
249  iterator emreclaimValue(const FillAction &action, Args&&... args);
250  template<typename... Args>
251  iterator emplaceValue(const FillAction &action, Args&&... args);
252 
253  iterator moveValue(const MoveAction &action);
254 
255  void swapValues(const SwapAction &action);
256 
257  iterator eraseValue(const EraseAction &action);
258 
259 };
260 
261 }
